extra_copy.content: The first Model 3 configuration to enter production features a long range battery, rear wheel drive and premium upgrades throughout.

groups.name: First Production

extra_copy.content: Model 3 is designed to achieve the highest safety ratings in every category.
Automatic Emergency Braking & Side Collision Warning
Keyless entry and remote climate control with app
Premium heated seating and cabin materials throughout, including open pore wood decor and two rear USBs
12-way, power adjustable front seats, steering column and side mirrors, with custom driver profiles
Premium audio system with more power, tweeters, surround speakers and subwoofer
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Center console with covered storage and docking for two smartphones

groups.description: Model 3 is designed to achieve the highest safety ratings in every category.

All new Tesla vehicles come standard with the most advanced driver assistance capabilities, designed to provide enhanced safety and convenience for a stress-free driving experience.
Detects objects that the car may impact and applies the brakes accordingly
Warns the driver of potential collisions with obstacles alongside the car
Warns of impending collisions with slower moving or stationary cars
Additional configurations, including the entry level Model 3 without upgrades, will become available as production ramps.

groups.name: Premium Upgrades
groups.description: Upgrade your interior with additional features and premium materials.

$APF2.name: Full Self-Driving Capability

extra_copy.content:
Requires Enhanced Autopilot
$4,000 upgrade after delivery
Model 3 will pilot itself along freeways and automatically park at your destination.

This functionality is dependent upon extensive software validation and regulatory approval. It is not possible to know exactly when it will be available, as this is highly dependent on local regulatory approval, which may vary widely by jurisdiction.

$APF2.description: In the future, Model 3 will be capable of conducting trips with no action required by the person in the driver‚Äôs seat.

$APPB.name: Enhanced Autopilot

extra_copy.content: In the future, tell Model 3 where to go and it will navigate with no driver intervention.

This is a driver's assistance feature with the driver responsible for remaining in control of the car at all times. Software has begun rolling out and features will continue to be introduced as validation is completed, subject to regulatory approval.

$APPB.description:
Model 3 will match speed to traffic conditions, keep within a lane, automatically change lanes, transition from one freeway to another, exit the freeway and self-park at your destination. This is a driver's assistance feature with the driver responsible for remaining in control of the car at all times.

Software has begun rolling out and features will continue to be introduced as validation is completed, subject to regulatory approval.

$BT37.name: Long Range Battery

extra_copy.content:
5.6 sec 0-60 mph
750 miles free annual Supercharging
170 miles of range in 30 minutes using Tesla's global Supercharger network
